dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Tell me… What do I need to cut?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: There’s nothing refreshing like swinging my sword through the morning air.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Manager, who do you usually have your lunch with? Um… As for me, I tend to eat alone. I’m more comfortable that way.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: It’s dark out. The sky would be brighter if I could cut out the moon. …I’m kidding, of course.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Are you satisfied with what you’re doing, Manager? Is your job fulfilling?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Oh, hi, Manager! I was just standing guard. You’ll join me…? Mmm… Sure! Go ahead.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: I envy Ms. Rodya. She never thinks too deeply and has no problem following her heart. It’s something I could never do.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: I was taught that you should show no hesitation when you wield a sword. But I can’t help but keep questioning myself… asking if it’s really okay to take others’ lives so easily…

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: However, when I actually cut someone down… I would get such a rush. I guess that’s my nature.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Huh? Manager, where did you go? Is this some kind of prank?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: I’ll become a sharper blade.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Without hesitation.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: This will help me hone my edge, right…?

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Please trust my blade…

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: I won’t hesitate…!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: I’ll be able to cut them down next, right?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Hng…!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: I slew them!

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: Don’t joke with me like this…

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: You have no hesitation!

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: This was inconceivable…

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: I was a little nervous… but it’s nice to see that it ended well.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: To slay others… was more delightful than I thought.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: I let my reluctance hold me back when it mattered most. It’s my fault.
